message: Brand Bible (Blue Light): Internal logic only. Do not lead with 'We are a tech company' in customer-facing copy. Focus on the service/app.
Brand Bible (Yellow Light): Do not promise 'cheapest' or 'best' rates. We offer transparency. Use 'Real-time quotes' or 'See exactly what you pay'.
Brand Bible (Yellow Light): Do not guarantee Business Banking acceptance. Policies vary. Use 'Many customers use us for...' instead.
Brand Bible (Red Light): FALSE. We do not offer Direct Deposit. Use 'Check Forwarding' or 'Check Deposit'.
Brand Bible (Red Light): MISLEADING. Only the exterior photo is free. Content scanning is paid.
Brand Bible (Red Light): WRONG TERMINOLOGY. 'Scan' implies opening mail. Use 'Photograph', 'Image', or 'External Imaging'.
Brand Bible (Red Light): IMPOSSIBLE. Do not imply zero processing time. Use 'View mail online the same day it arrives'.
Brand Bible (Red Light): Fluff/Hype. Avoid generic intros. Write AS the brand, not ABOUT the brand.
Brand Bible (Yellow Light): Technically inaccurate. You must immediately correct this to 'Real Street Address' in the text.
Brand Bible (Risky): Use caution. We generally recommend for Business use. Do not promise acceptance for personal ID.
